about.details:
Incorporated in 1989, Hemant Surgical Industries Limited is engaged in the business of manufacturing, importing, and assembling. Also, the company markets a comprehensive portfolio of medical equipments and disposables.

The wide spectrum of equipments and disposables offered by the company includes:

  • Renal Care
  • Cardiovascular disease
  • Respiratory disease
  • Critical Care and Radiology
  • Surgical disposables

The products processed in the assembly units of the company are imported from countries like: Japan, China France, and Australia.

Hemant Surgical Industries presently has one manufacturing unit and two assembly units. The first Manufacturing Unit is situated at Achad Industrial Estate. The company started its operations of importing and marketing of medical disposables through this unit in 1999. The other two assembling units are located at Atgaon and Bhiwandi, respectively. These two assembling units undertake the assembling of medical products and devices.

The company's facilities are ISO 9001:2015 and ISO 13485:2016 certified. They have a fully equipped quality control department with experienced and qualified staff to facilitate smooth manufacturing and assembly line processes.

faqs.question: What is the Hemant Surgical Industries IPO?
faqs.answer:
Hemant Surgical Industries IPO is a SME IPO of 2760000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹24.84 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹90 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on May 24, 2023, and closes on May 26, 2023.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Hemant Surgical Industries IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Hemant Surgical Industries IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Hemant Surgical Industries IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Hemant Surgical Industries IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Hemant Surgical Industries IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Hemant Surgical Industries IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Hemant Surgical Industries IPO opens on May 24, 2023 and closes on May 26, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Hemant Surgical Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: Hemant Surgical Industries IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,44,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Hemant Surgical Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Hemant Surgical Industries IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Hemant Surgical Industries IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Hemant Surgical Industries IPO will be done on Wednesday, May 31, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, June 2, 2023. Check the Hemant Surgical Industries IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Hemant Surgical Industries IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Hemant Surgical Industries IPO listing date is on Monday, June 5, 2023.
